Frame sizes divisible by 16 is better.

for flash: 544x304
for view larger: 1024x768

make sure to add the rate flag (-r)  before the input flag when encoding image sequences. 
_________________________________________________________

Use these fractional equations for rate to respresent these NTSC framerates.

24000/1001 = 23.987
30000/1001 = 29.98
60000/1001 = 59.94
_________________________________________________________

Picks:
High Rez- 15B  (crf values of between 20 & 23.  Can be float values too, e.g. 22.5.  Lower value is better quality)
Low Rez- 
_________________________________________________________

Encoding from a pipe.
Convert loads all images into memory first.  This gets up to several hundreds megs.

./convert /data/converted/*.jp2 jpg: | ./ffmpeg -vcodec mjpeg -f image2pipe -i - /data/out.mp4

This is better as ppm is not compressed.

./convert /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/ffmpeg/sequences/03_VL2_JP2/03_VL2.*.jp2 ppm: | ./ffmpeg -f image2pipe -vcodec ppm -i - ~/Desktop/out.mp4

_________________________________________________________
  
Using a filelist instead of image sequence wildcards.

* "-i @somefile" would signal an image list (and also imply/require image2). "-i @-" would mean 'playlist on stdin'.

* The image list would be 1 file per line.

* Wildcards would *not* be supported natively; to use wildcard, one 
would use the shell to produce an imagelist file.


________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________
________________________________________________________

1) ./ffmpeg -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/informer/03.mov -threads 2 -vcodec libx264 -coder 1 -flags +loop -cmp +chroma -partitions +parti4x4+partp8x8 -me hex -subq 5 -me_range 16 -g 250 -keyint_min 25 -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor 0.71 -b_strategy 1 -psnr  ~/Desktop/03_1.mp4

PSNR Mean Y:35.065 U:38.781 V:39.408 Avg:36.040 Global:36.036 kb/s:1778.37
1.3mb
________________________________________________________

2) ./ffmpeg -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/informer/03.mov -threads 2 -vcodec libx264 -coder 1 -flags +loop -cmp +chroma -partitions +parti4x4+partp8x8 -me hex -subq 5 -me_range 16 -g 250 -keyint_min 25 -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor 0.71 -b_strategy 1 -psnr -crf 25 ~/Desktop/03_2.mp4

PSNR Mean Y:35.693 U:39.245 V:39.887 Avg:36.640 Global:36.593 kb/s:2066.07
1.5mb
_________________________________________________________

3) ./ffmpeg -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/informer/03.mov -threads 2 -vcodec libx264 -an -pass 1 -flags +loop -cmp +chroma -partitions +parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 -me epzs -subq 1 -trellis 0 -refs 1 -bf 3 -b_strategy 1 -coder 1 -me_range 16 -g 250 -keyint_min 25 -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor 0.71 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qcomp 0.6 -qmin 10 -qmax 51 -qdiff 4 ~/Desktop/03_3.mp4

./ffmpeg -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/informer/03.mov -threads 2 -vcodec libx264 -an -pass 2 -flags +loop -cmp +chroma -partitions +parti4x4+partp8x8+partb8x8 -flags2 +mixed_refs -me umh -subq 5 -trellis 1 -refs 5 -bf 3 -b_strategy 1 -coder 1 -me_range 16 -g 250 -keyint_min 25 -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor 0.71 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qcomp 0.6 -qmin 10 -qmax 51 -qdiff 4-psnr ~/Desktop/03_3.mp4

PSNR Mean Y:24.237 U:34.897 V:35.172 Avg:25.821 Global:25.804 kb/s:206.63

This was awful....

20) ./ffmpeg -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/ffmpeg/03_PREVIEW.mov -threads auto -vcodec libx264 -subq 10 -refs 6 -me umh -me_range 20 -partitions +parti4x4+parti8x8+partp8x8+partp4x4+partb8x8 -qcomp .7 -g 5 -keyint_min 25 -bf 3 -flags +loop+umv -psnr -flags2 +bpyramid+mixed_refs+dct8x8 -coder 1 -cmp +chroma -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor .7 -benchmark -crf 25 -b_strategy 1 -trellis 1 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qmin 5 -qmax 35 -qdiff 2 -qscale .5 -s 544x304 ~/Desktop/03_PREVIEW.mp4

21) ./ffmpeg -r 24000/1001 -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/ffmpeg/sequences/03_VL2/03_VL2.%03d.png -threads auto -vcodec libx264 -subq 10 -refs 6 -me umh -me_range 20 -partitions +parti4x4+parti8x8+partp8x8+partp4x4+partb8x8 -qcomp .7 -g 2 -keyint_min 25 -bf 3 -flags +loop+umv -psnr -flags2 +bpyramid+mixed_refs+dct8x8 -coder 1 -cmp +chroma -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor .7 -benchmark -crf 35 -b_strategy 1 -trellis 1 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qmin 5 -qmax 35 -qdiff 2 -qscale .25 -s 544x304 ~/Desktop/03_15.mp4 

22) ./ffmpeg -r 24000/1001 -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/ffmpeg/sequences/03_VL2/03_VL2.%03d.png -threads auto -vcodec libx264 -subq 10 -refs 6 -me umh -me_range 20 -partitions +parti4x4+parti8x8+partp8x8+partp4x4+partb8x8 -qcomp .7 -g 2 -bf 3 -flags +loop+umv -psnr -flags2 +bpyramid+mixed_refs+dct8x8 -coder 1 -cmp +chroma -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor .7 -benchmark -crf 35 -b_strategy 1 -trellis 1 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qmin 5 -qmax 35 -qdiff 2 -qscale .25 -s 544x304 ~/Desktop/03_15.mp4 

23) ./ffmpeg -r 24000/1001 -i /Data/QUICKTIME_TESTS/ffmpeg/sequences/03_VL2/03_VL2.%03d.png -threads auto -vcodec libx264 -subq 10 -refs 6 -me umh -me_range 20 -partitions +parti4x4+parti8x8+partp8x8+partp4x4+partb8x8 -qcomp .7 -g 5 -bf 3 -flags +loop+umv -psnr -flags2 +bpyramid+mixed_refs+dct8x8 -coder 1 -cmp +chroma -sc_threshold 40 -i_qfactor .7 -benchmark -crf 35 -b_strategy 1 -trellis 1 -rc_eq 'blurCplx^(1-qComp)' -qmin 5 -qmax 35 -qdiff 2 -qscale .25 -s 544x304 ~/Desktop/03_15.mp4
